group_1.textLeft: In these hard times, everyone needs respite.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I guess that's what entertainment's@all about.

group_1.textLeft: Oh goodness… I'm so excited about this@that I'm hyperventilating…

group_1.textRight: You're really crazy about this, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, don't you feel the same way, Chizuru?

group_1.textRight: I'm looking forward to it, but I'm not@going nuts like you are.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm…?
Did something happen recently…?@You're acting strange these days.
You've been in a foul mood.

group_1.textRight: Whatever. So what's the plan for today?

group_1.textLeft: From what I gather, there will be a performance@of The Tale of the Brothers Soga tonight.
It's the story I read to you about the brothers@avenging their father's death.

group_1.textRight: The story was so complicated that I didn't@really get what was going on.

group_1.textLeft: Once you grasp its intricacies, it becomes@a poignant and moving tale.
The two Soga brothers speak with their@adversary, Kudō Suketsune, at his mansion.
Kudō declares that the fact he killed their father@is none of their concern, enraging them!
GRAH!
However, the brothers earn the support@of many powerful noble clans.
With the older brother's lover's help, they kill Kudō@and conduct the jūbangiri, slaying ten samurai!
One brother dies and the other goes alone to@enact justice on their late grandfather's nemesis.
As he draws his blade to kill Shogun Minamoto@no Yoritomo, he announces their names!

group_1.narration: [bgEffect:shakeSmall]"WE ARE THE GRANDSONS OF ITO@AND THE SONS OF KAWAZU,@SUKENARI JURO AND TOKIMUNE GORO!"

group_1.textRight: [chara:104601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Holy shit, keep it down!@The whole world can hear you!

group_1.textLeft: Ah!
M-my apologies, that was quite unlike me…
But once you see it on stage,@you'll understand.
Let's go enjoy it together.

group_1.textCenter: *Sigh* The feeling still rings in my chest…
How can I possibly put this euphoria@into words…?
You're one of the Taito Gang's bodyguards, yes?@Have you been keeping watch over Chizuru?

group_1.textLeft: Where did she go…?

group_1.textRight: …It humiliates me to say this, but…
I've lost track of her, too.@I have no idea where to start looking…

group_1.textLeft: Well, she IS the most skilled member@of your gang…
Perhaps she went home so she wouldn't@be discovered here…?
Father.
Do you happen to know whether Chizuru@has come to the castle today?

group_1.textRight: I can't even tell when she's here or not.@No one can predict her.
Ashamed as I am to admit it,@I can't help you here.

group_1.textLeft: What a predicament…
Yes, she vanished without a trace…
